tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Employees (employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Departments (department_id INT PRIMARY KEY, department_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE Addresses (address_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT REFERENCES Employees(employee_id), street_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, state VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, postal_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Salaries (salary_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT REFERENCES Employees(employee_id), salary_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, start_date DATE NOT NULL, end_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE Contacts (contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT REFERENCES Employees(employee_id), contact_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, contact_info VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
